title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: When creating two projects, P1 and P2, selecting P2 and closing it, the Open/Close project option is sometimes not available. This discrepancy is inconsistent as it should either be available for both projects or neither. NOTES: N/A
OB: The Open/Close project option is not always available after closing a selected project.
EB: The Open/Close project option should be consistently available after closing a selected project.
SR: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select P2. 3. Close P2.
